Module.name: SVTTGEO10
Module.comment: is evolution of svttgeo6 with carbon replacing Be as per Dave Lynn:

Document.Module:
AGECOM GCONST GCUNIT
SVTT,SLYD,SLSD,SLDI,STLI,STSI,SVTD,SBER,STAB,STRU,SPCB,SRHC,SBWC,SWCM,SXAI,SXBI,STRA,SSID,SSIR,SELE,SWCH,SWCW,SWCS,SBOI,SAGP,SDYE,SECA,SIRP,SIRT,SOER,SCON,SROD,SGRA,STAP,STAC,SHLA,SHLB,SHMA,SHMB,SWHO,SHWA,SCMY,SCAL,SWMM,SWMB,SWRP,SXRL,SYRU,SWMT,SWMS,SWMW,SOTB,SITB,SBRG,SBRM,SBRI,SOES,SIES,SOSM,SISM,SCRW,SGLA,SBSP,SAKM,SCKM,SBSR,SBCR,SBRX,SBRL,SBMM,SBMO,SBMI,SMRD,SALM,SISH,SSSH,SOSH,SCBM,SCBL,SFED,SPLS,SOUM,SOUR
iLayer,s,side,ilad,iwaf,i,j
ladthk,cone_thk1,cone_thk2,roffset,RsizeMax,deg,rad,c0
cone_len,cone_sin,cone_cos,rmin,rmax,zmin,zmax,angle
xpos,ypos,zpos,clearance,rin,rou,elethk,tabLen,radmax
endrng_z,brack_z,screw_z,ir_rmin,ang,wafpckLen,dthk,radtilt
xbuf,phi,xbuf1,xbuf2
yPCB,A,CuThk,sq,tube_angle
radii(6),rad_cones_in(5),rad_cones_out(5),rad_offset,shield_phi(4)
trapY,ssidX,ssirY
i_phi
radii(1)= 6.37 radii(2)= 7.38 radii(3)=10.38 radii(4)=11.27 radii(5)=14.19 radii(6)=15.13 rad_offset=0.015 shield_phi(1)=9.0 shield_phi(2)=27.0 shield_phi(3)=45.0 shield_phi(4)=63.0
rad_cones_in(i) = 8.5+2.60*(i-1) rad_cones_out(i)=15.0+0.85*(i-1)
SVTG_RsizeMin = 6.0
RsizeMax=ssup_Con4IdMx RsizeMax=RsizeMax+ssup_GrphThk+ssup_CabThk+2.0*ssup_HosRmx RsizeMax=RsizeMax+ssup_WrpMyThk+ssup_WrpAlThk Clearance=svtg_RsizeMax-RsizeMax
endrng_z=serg_EndRngZm+serg_EndRngTh brack_z=swca_Length/2+ssup_ERJzdis screw_z=endrng_z+0.5*(brack_z-endrng_z)
radmax=svtg_rSizeMax
radmax=svtl_radius
radmax=svtg_rSizeMax
tube_angle=(pi/(2.0*SVTL_Nladder))*(i_phi-0.5)
ladthk = swca_WaferThk/2+swca_RoHaThk+swca_WafCarTh
elethk=2.0*selc_BeThk+selc_WatThk+selc_BeOThk+selc_AgPdThk elethk=elethk+selc_GlassThk+selc_DyeThk deg=180.0/svtl_Nladder rad=Pi/svtl_Nladder
rmin=svtl_radius-ladthk rmax=sqrt((svtl_radius)**2+(swca_WaferWid/2)**2)+elethk
rmax = svtl_radius*svtl_radius rmax += swca_waferwid * swca_waferwid / 4.0 rmax = sqrt(rmax) + elethk
rmax=min(rmax,radmax-ladthk)
c0=-deg*mod(ilayer,2)+svtg_Angoff*int((ilayer-1)/2)
c0=90-deg*mod(ilayer,2)
deg=180.0/svtl_Nladder rad=(TwoPi/2)/svtl_Nladder
xpos=sin(rad)*selc_ElcaWid/2-cos(rad)*elethk/2 ypos=cos(rad)*selc_ElcaWid/2+sin(rad)*elethk/2
tabLen=swca_Length/2-7*(swca_WaferWid/2+swca_WaferGap)
yPCB = SVTL_Nwafer*(swca_WaferLen+swca_WaferGap)/2.0 + SVTL_PcbGap + SVTL_PcbLen/2.0
trapY=swca_SensWid/2.0-(swca_SensWid-swca_SensGir)/2.0
ssidX=swca_WaferLen/2.0-(swca_WaferLen-swca_SensLen)/4.0 ssirY=swca_WaferWid/2.0-(swca_WaferWid-swca_SensWid)/4.0
sq = (scbp_len*scbp_len) sq /= (scbp_rmin2-scbp_rmin1) sq /= (scbp_rmin2-scbp_rmin1)
A = pi A *= (scbp_rmin1*scbp_rmin1 + scbp_rmin2*scbp_rmin2) A *= sqrt(1+sq)
CuThk=(SCBP_Vol/A)*sqrt(1.0+1.0/sq)
sq = sfep_len * sfep_len sq /= (sfep_rmin2 - sfep_rmin1) sq /= (sfep_rmin2 - sfep_rmin1)
A = pi A *= (sfep_rmin1*sfep_rmin1 + sfep_rmin2+sfep_rmin2) A *= sqrt(1+sq)
CuThk=(SFEP_Vol/A)*sqrt(1.0+1.0/sq)
sq = sfep_len * sfep_len sq /= (sfep_rmin2 - sfep_rmin1) sq /= (sfep_rmin2 - sfep_rmin1)
A = pi A *= (sfep_rmin1*sfep_rmin1 + sfep_rmin2+sfep_rmin2) A *= sqrt(1+sq)
CuThk=(SFEP_Vol/A)*sqrt(1.0+1.0/sq)
ir_rmin = cos(pi/8.0) ir_rmin += sqrt( tan(pi/8.0)*tan(pi/8.0) - sin(pi/8.0)*sin(pi/8.0) ) ir_rmin *= serg_irngprmn
rou = cos(pi/8.0) rou += sqrt( tan(pi/8.0)*tan(pi/8.0) - sin(pi/8.0)*sin(pi/8.0) ) rou = serg_irngtrmx / rou
rin=serg_IrngPrMn rou=serg_OrngRmax
cone_thk1=ssup_GrphThk cone_thk2=cone_thk1+ssup_CabThk+2*ssup_HosRmx cone_thk2=cone_thk2+ssup_WrpMyThk+ssup_WrpAlThk
roffset=ssup_GrphThk
roffset=ssup_GrphThk+ssup_CabThk/2
roffset=ssup_GrphThk+ssup_CabThk
roffset=ssup_GrphThk+ssup_CabThk rmin=ssup_Con3IdMn+roffset rmax=ssup_Con4IdMn+roffset zmin=ssup_Rodlen/2+ssup_GrphThk zmax=ssup_Cone3zmx
cone_len = (zmax-zmin)*(zmax-zmin) cone_len += (rmax-rmin)*(rmax-rmin) cone_len = sqrt(cone_len) cone_sin=(rmax-rmin)/cone_len cone_cos=(zmax-zmin)/cone_len angle=asin(cone_sin)*180/pi xpos=rmin+0.5*(rmax-rmin)+ssup_HosRmx*cone_cos zpos=-ssup_HosRmx*cone_sin
roffset=ssup_GrphThk+ssup_CabThk
roffset=ssup_GrphThk+ssup_CabThk rmin=ssup_Con4IdMn+roffset rmax=ssup_Con4IdMx+roffset
zmin=ssup_Cone3zmx zmax=ssup_Cone4zmx
cone_len = (zmax-zmin)*(zmax-zmin) cone_len += (rmax-rmin)*(rmax-rmin) cone_len = sqrt(cone_len)
cone_sin=(rmax-rmin)/cone_len cone_cos=(zmax-zmin)/cone_len
angle=asin(cone_sin)*180/pi
xpos=rmin+0.5*(rmax-rmin)+ssup_HosRmx*cone_cos zpos=-ssup_HosRmx*cone_sin
roffset=ssup_GrphThk+ssup_CabThk+2.0*ssup_HosRmx
roffset=ssup_GrphThk+ssup_CabThk+2.0*ssup_HosRmx+ssup_WrpMyThk
rin=swam_Rmin-swam_TbrdThk rou=swam_Rmax+swam_TbrdThk
rin=swam_Rmin rou=ssup_Con1IdMn
phi=i*ssub_SRCutPhi+180*j
xbuf1=(ssub_KMountOD/4.0+(svtg_RSizeMin+ssub_SRollOd)/2.0)
xbuf2=svtg_RSizeMin+ssub_SRollOd/2
xbuf=ssub_SRCutIn+(ssub_SRCutOut-ssub_SRCutIn)/2
phi=i*ssub_SRCutPhi+180*j
xbuf=-(ssub_MBlkORad+ssub_MBlkIRad)/2+svtg_RSizeMin+ssub_SRollOd
xbuf=-ssub_MBlkORad+svtg_RSizeMin+ssub_SRollOd
xbuf=-ssub_MBlkIRad+svtg_RSizeMin+ssub_SRollOd
